DataElement.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:Refers to preserved specimens embedded in support material.  These are typically cut into thin slices for microscopic examination, with or without an enhancement such as staining._The chemical preservation of a substance to maintain structural and/or molecular features of that substance as they exist in the living entity._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

These are typically cut into thin slices for microscopic examination, with or without an enhancement such as staining._The chemical preservation of a substance to maintain structural and/or molecular features of that substance as they exist in the living entity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:Refers to preserved specimens embedded in support material.  These are typically cut into thin slices for microscopic examination, with or without an enhancement such as staining.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
Refers to preserved specimens embedded in support material.  These are typically cut into thin slices for microscopic examination, with or without an enhancement such as staining.

Property.preferredDefinition: The chemical preservation of a substance to maintain structural and/or molecular features of that substance as they exist in the living entity.

Concepts.definition: The chemical preservation of a substance to maintain structural and/or molecular features of that substance as they exist in the living entity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
